 F
or consistency, we use US Occupational Safety & Health 
Administration (OSHA) definitions to record incident data worldwide. Rates are calculated based on the OSHA standard using 200,000 labor hours, which is equivalent to 100 employees working a full year. Contingent workers are not included in incident rates. Data reflect injuries and illnesses at all sites worldwide, and are reported on a calendar year basis. Fiscal year 2022 corresponds to calendar year 2021, and so forth.
